item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-08-22
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Legal Seafood Chestnut Hill. #
  • RT: Intro to jQuery (via @JamisonKelly) #
  • Watching "Southland Tales". I think if they played the movie backwards it would make more sense. #
  • Ok, could someone explain this movie now? Maybe I'm not smart enough to figure it out. #
  • I'm at Friendly Toast (20 Hampshire St, Boston). #
  • White wine @ Legal Seafood #
  • Oysters Legal @ Legal Seafood #
  • Oysters Legal @ Legal Seafood #
  • Breakfast Sandwich @ Friendly Toast #
  • I'm at Natick Collection (1245 Worcester Street, Natick). #
  • Friendly Toast in Kendall is like Urban Outfitters opened a greasy spoon. Good food, kooky decor with spotty service. #
  • RT: Web Developers Are Stupid (via @justinvincent) #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
